name: The Lost Mummy (MO-Nasser)
description:
The Lost Mummy is a 2D platformer game.

The mommy is searching for a map parts to find his life key to bringing him back to life during that he faces enemies and the player has to beat kill them.

it's our submissions for the Global Game Jam 2021 for lost and found theme.

credits
